import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Product = ({ product }) => { return (

{product.name.substring(0, 15)}

{product.title}

{product.email.substring(0, 20)}

{product.address}

{product.phone}

{product.status === 'Active' ? : } {product.status}

) } export default Product
